A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I think it's good\, it's probably really good\, it could even be great. It's hard to know how good without repeated viewings\, and giving it time to settle in to what we consider canonical Star Wars mythology.
All these supposed superfans jumping in and saying it's worse than the prequels are just flat out wrong IMO. I think it may even be better than the Force Awakens. Only time will tell.

Don't forget that critics and superfans also panned Empire when it came out.
